comment: A simple question : Do you have faith in Britain post Brexit ? ( Please R . T . for a very strong sample size . Thanks for that )
amr:
# ::snt A simple question : Do you have faith in Britain post Brexit ? ( Please R . T . for a very strong sample size . Thanks for that )
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (q / question-01
            :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                  :polarity-of (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (f / faith)
                        :prep-in (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Britain"))
                        :time (a / after
                              :op1 (e / event
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "EU")))))
            :ARG1-of (s / simple-02))
      :snt2 (t2 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "R."
                        :op2 "T."))
            :ARG2 (s2 / size-01
                  :ARG1 (s3 / sample)
                  :ARG1-of (s4 / strong-02
                        :degree (v / very)))))
